tool_description: Workable, recruit people by creating beautiful job posts through an API
name: Workable
title: Workable

api_list.name: /candidates

parameters.name: candidate
parameters.description: Look at the example on the right hand side for all parameters

parameters.name: shortcode
parameters.description: The shortcode is a unique identifier for each jobs and can be seen by invoking  "/jobs"

utterances.utterance: Please add a new candidate named John Doe with email john.doe@example.com for the job with shortcode dev2024.
I want to create a candidate profile for Emily Clark, phone number 555-1234, applying to the marketing position with shortcode mktg5678.
Add candidate Michael Brown with LinkedIn profile linkedin.com/in/michaelbrown for the job identified by shortcode hr9012.
Create a new candidate entry for Sarah Lee, who has a portfolio at sarahlee.dev, for the job with shortcode ux3456.
Please register candidate David Kim with resume link davidkimresume.com for the sales job with shortcode sales7890.
Add a candidate named Anna Martinez with email anna.martinez@example.org for the job posting shortcode eng1122.
Create candidate profile for Robert Wilson, contact number 777-888-9999, applying to the job with shortcode design3344.
Please add candidate Lisa Chen with GitHub profile github.com/lisachen for the developer role with shortcode dev9988.
Register candidate Mark Johnson who has a personal website markjohnson.me for the job identified by shortcode finance5566.
Add a new candidate named Olivia Davis with email olivia.davis@company.com for the job with shortcode admin7788.
